```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(fivethirtyeight)
library(plotly)
```

```{r}
advanced = read_csv("data/advanced_stats.csv")
```

```{r}
advanced|>
  plot_ly(x = ~ Season,
         y = ~ `TOV%`,
         z = ~ `AST%`,
         color = ~ Player,
         type = "scatter3d",
         mode = "markers")

```
